rbf.config



immutable string yamlSettings;
configuration file name

struct LayoutConfig;
struct for describing layout metadata

string description;
a short description of the layout

string mapping;
how to map a read line to a record object?

string xmlFile;
XML definition of layout

Regex!char ignoreRecord;
in some case, we need to get rid of some lines

string skipField;
in some cases, don't take into account some fields

string layoutType;
what kind of layout is it?

class Setting;
class for reading JSON property file

this(string yamlConfigFile);
read the YAML configuration file

Params:
string yamlConfigFile optional file configuration file
